card_name: Descent of the King of Knights
card_text: At the start of the game, the player going second gets 3 Evolution Points. When paying an {[evolve]} or [ride] cost, you may use an Evolution Point in lieu of 1 play point by turning it facedown. (Only one can be used per evolution or ride, and you can only activate {[evolve]} or [ride] abilities once per turn.)

{[evolve]} {[cost01]}: Evolve this follower.

{[evolve]} {[cost01]}: Evolve this follower.
{[fanfare]} Select any number of enemy followers on the field and engage them.

On Evolve - Select an opponent. Each follower on their field doesn't refresh during their next start phase.
At the start of your end phase, select an opponent and draw cards equal to the number of engaged followers on their field.

{[evolve]} {[cost07]}: Evolve this follower.
{[fanfare]} If there are at least 7 faceup evolved followers in your evolve deck, evolve this follower.

Storm.
This follower ignores Ward.
Whenever this follower deals damage to an enemy leader, recover all your play points.

This follower can't attack its owner.
{[fanfare]} Give control of this card to another player. (Move it to the field of another player whose field isn't full.)
At the start of your end phase, deal 5 damage to your leader.

Aura.
At the start of your end phase, turn a facedown card in your evolve deck faceup: Select an enemy leader and deal it 2 damage. If there are at least 5 faceup cards in your evolve deck, deal 2 damage to each enemy leader. If there are at least 10, deal 10 damage to each enemy follower on the field. If there are at least 20, you win the game.

Storm.
{[fanfare]} Select another follower on your field. Give it {[attack]}+2/{[defense]}+2 and Storm. If your leader is {[swordcraft]}, give to each other follower on your field instead.

Bane.
On Evolve - Select an enemy follower on the field and destroy it. Its controller destroys a follower without Aura on the field, excluding this one.

Ward.
{[fanfare]} Each opponent summons a Dragon token.
{[fanfare]} If you have 10 max play points, summon a Dragon token.
{[lastwords]} Give your leader {[defense]}+5.
{[fanfare]} Deal X damage to each enemy leader and enemy follower on the field. X equals the number of faceup evolved followers in your evolve deck.
{[fanfare]} Evolve this follower.

Assail.
On Evolve - Select an enemy follower on the field and deal it 4 damage.

This card can't be played from the EX area.
----------
At the start of your end phase, if this card is on your field or in your EX area, put a Hornet Warrior token into your EX area.
{[lastwords]} Put this card into its owner's EX area.

{[evolve]}{[cost01]}: Evolve this follower.
Ward.
This follower can't attack enemies.
{[fanfare]} Combo (3) - Give your leader {[defense]}+4. Draw 2 cards.

Ward.
This follower can't attack enemies.
{[lastwords]} Until the start of your next turn, your leader can't lose defense.

{[evolve]} {[cost01]}: Evolve this follower.
Storm.
{[fanfare]} If your leader is {[forestcraft]}, search your deck for a Beast follower that costs 5 or less, summon it, then shuffle.

Storm.
On Evolve, Combo (3) - Search your deck for a follower, summon it, then shuffle. Give each other Beast follower that costs 7 or less on your field Storm.

{[evolve]} {[cost02]}: Evolve this follower.
{[fanfare]} Return each enemy follower on the field and enemy card in the EX area to its owner's hand.
On Evolve - Give each enemy leader {[defense]}-1 for every card in its controller's hand.

{[fanfare]} If this card was played, take another turn after this one.
{[lastwords]} Banish this card.

{[evolve]} {[cost01]}: Evolve this follower.
{[fanfare]} Reveal a Beast card from your hand: Select an enemy follower on the field and deal it 5 damage.
{[fanfare]} Combo (5) - Until the start of your next turn, each follower on your field has Intimidate and Aura.

When playing this card, reveal a Beast follower from your hand: This card costs 3 less to play.

Select an enemy follower on the field and destroy it.

{[evolve]} {[cost02]}: Evolve this follower.
{[fanfare]} Select an amulet on your field. Destroy it, draw a card, and, if your leader is {[havencraft]}, evolve this follower.

{[evolve]} {[cost03]}: Evolve this follower.
At the start of each player's end phase, if there's an Angel follower on their field, they give their leader {[defense]}+3 and draw a card.

At the start of each player's end phase, if there's an Angel follower on their field, they give their leader {[defense]}+3 and draw a card.

{[fanfare]} Place 3 myth counters on this card.
At the start of your end phase, select an enemy leader and, if this card has no myth counters, deal the selected leader 2 damage.
{[act]} {[engage]}, remove a myth counter from this card: Select an enemy follower on the field. Banish it and give its controller control of this card.
Storm. Bane.
On Evolve - Summon a Shield Guardian token.

Ward.

Whenever a Forest Bat is put onto your field, give your leader {[defense]}+1.

On Evolve - Summon 2 Puppet tokens.
Once on each of your turns, when a Puppet you control leaves the field, put a Lloyd token into your EX area.

On Evolve - Summon 2 Puppet tokens.
Once on each of your turns, when a Puppet you control leaves the field, put a Lloyd token into your EX area.

{[evolve]} {[cost01]}: Evolve this follower.
Ward.
{[fanfare]} Select an opponent. They bury a follower. Give your leader {[defense]} equal to the buried follower's defense.

Bane. Ward.
At the start of your end phase, each opponent who has a follower with X attack on their field deals 4 damage to their leader. X equals the highest attack among followers on the field.

{[evolve]} {[cost01]}: Evolve this follower.
{[fanfare]} If your leader is {[havencraft]}, search your deck for a 3-cost amulet and 1-cost amulet, summon them, then shuffle your deck.
At the start of your end phase, select an enemy leader or enemy follower on the field. Deal it damage equal to the number of amulets on your field.

{[fanfare]} Each player may add an amulet from their cemetery to their hand.
{[act]} {[cost05]}, {[engage]}: You may summon an amulet from your hand.

{[evolve]} {[cost01]}: Evolve this follower.
{[fanfare]} Choose one of the following. (1) Search your deck for a 1-cost follower, summon it, then shuffle your deck. (2) Select a card in your banished zone and add it to your hand.

Ward.
On Evolve - Draw a card. Each player rolls a 6-sided die. Each player with the highest roll gives their leader {[defense]}+3 and draws a card.

Storm. (Followers with Storm can attack enemy followers and leaders on the turn they're put onto your field.)
{[fanfare]} Select up to 1 card on each opponent's field and banish them.

{[evolve]} {[cost01]}: Evolve this follower.
Aura. (Cards with Aura can't be selected for enemy spells or abilities.)
At the start of your end phase, change this follower's defense to 4.

Aura.

At the start of your end phase, change this follower's defense to 5.

Ward. (While you have engaged followers with Ward, opponents can't attack your other followers or leader. You may engage this follower when it's put onto your field or during your end phase.)
{[fanfare]} Select a card in an opponent's EX area and banish it.

Ward. (While you have engaged followers with Ward, opponents can't attack your other followers or leader. You may engage this follower when it's put onto your field or during your end phase.)

While this card is reserved on your field, it takes damage instead of your leader.
{[lastwords]} Select an enemy leader and deal it 3 damage.

Storm. (Followers with Storm can attack enemy followers and leaders on the turn they're put onto your field.)
Strike - Draw 2 cards. Recover 3 play points.

{[evolve]} {[cost01]}: Evolve this follower.
Bane.
{[act]} {[cost01]}, discard this card: Discard any number of cards of different classes. Draw that many cards.

Bane.
On Evolve - Reveal cards from the top of your deck until you reveal 2 followers. Summon them. Shuffle the rest and put them on the bottom of your deck.

{[evolve]} {[cost02]}: Evolve this follower.
At the start of your end phase, if your leader is {[abysscraft]}, give your leader {[defense]}+2, draw a card, then each opponent discards a card and buries a follower.
At the start of your end phase, if your leader is {[abysscraft]}, give your leader {[defense]}+4, draw 2 cards, then each opponent discards 2 cards and buries 2 followers.

At the start of your end phase, bury the top card of your deck.
{[act]} {[cost02]}, {[engage]}, bury this card: Select a follower in your cemetery and summon it. Activate only if there are at least 20 cards in your cemetery.

Ward.
{[fanfare]} During your next turn, your Fanfare abilities trigger 2 times.

{[fanfare]} Select an enemy follower on the field and deal it 2 damage. Necrocharge (10) - Deal 5 damage instead. NC (20) - Deal 3 damage to its leader. (If your cemetery contains at least 10 cards, perform NC (10). Then, if it contains at least 20, perform NC (20).)

Select a Demon follower in your cemetery and deal damage equal to its attack to each enemy follower on the field. Necrocharge (20) - Summon it. (If your cemetery contains at least 20 cards, perform NC (20).)

{[quick]}
Select an enemy follower on the field that's attacking your leader. You may change its attack target to any other leader or follower on the field (regardless of whether it would normally be attackable).

While this card is reserved on your field, it takes damage instead of your leader.
{[lastwords]} Select an enemy leader and deal it 3 damage.

At the start of each player's main phase, they roll a 6-sided die. If they roll a 1, 2, or 3, they give their leader {[defense]}+1 and draw a card. If they roll a 4, 5, or 6, you give your leader {[defense]}+1 and draw a card.

Aura. (Cards with Aura can't be selected for enemy spells or abilities.)

Whenever a {[swordcraft]} follower is put onto your field, give it {[attack]}+3/{[defense]}+3 and Rush.

{[fanfare]} Each player reveals up to 1 non-spell card from their hand simultaneously. Each player who revealed an X-cost card summons it. X equals the cost of the 2nd card when the revealed cards are ordered from highest cost to lowest.
{[q]}{[act]} {[cost02]}, {[engage]}, bury this card: Select an enemy follower on the field and destroy it.

{[quick]}
This card costs 3 less to play if your leader is {[dragoncraft]}.
----------
Select 2 followers on the field. Deal the first follower damage equal to the second's attack. Deal the second follower damage equal to the first's attack.

Search your deck for a follower that costs 3 or less and a follower that costs 5 or less and summon them. If your leader is {[runecraft]}, also search your deck for a follower that costs 7 or less, summon it, and recover 2 play points. Shuffle your deck.
At the start of your end phase, if your leader is {[abysscraft]}, give your leader {[defense]}+4, draw 2 cards, then each opponent discards 2 cards and buries 2 followers.

{[fanfare]} The coming year will be filled with happiness.
----------
This card can't be used in official events.
